Package fr.umlv.escape.front

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Sprite
    Interface that represent an animation
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackGroundScroller
    Class that manage a scrolling background.
    DisplayableMonitor
    This class manage all elements that can be displayed in the FrontApplication including drawing elements and launching sprite associated to them.
    FrontApplication
    This class create and draw the window of the game.
    FrontImages
    This class contains all the images to draw
    ImagesFactory
    This class supplies methods to create properly a Image.
    PlayerSprites
    Class that manage all sprites of Player
    SpriteBullet
    Class that manage all sprites of Bullet
    SpriteExplosion
    Class that an explosion sprite
    UserInterface
    Contains tools functions who help to print the User Interface in game
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerSprites.SpriteType
    Represent one of the sprite player
